HeroSection.title: Empower your financial journey with Waletoo
HeroSection.subtitle: Enter your income and expenses effortlessly, and gain tailored insights with personalized charts. Waletoo offers expert guidance to help you make informed financial decisions and optimize your financial health.
HeroSection.disclaimer: Waletoo does not connect with your bank account.

KeyFeatures.title: Key Features
KeyFeatures.heading: Take control of your personal finances with confidence
KeyFeatures.description: Waletoo provides a comprehensive set of tools designed to give you full control over your personal finances. Benefit from personalized insights, expert financial advice, and smart tools to manage your money more effectively.

feature1.title: Tailored Financial Visualizations
feature1.description: Visualize your income and expenses with ease, and get a clear picture of your financial situation.

feature2.title: Expert financial guidance (Premium)
feature2.description: Receive tailored advice and insights from top financial experts. Identify areas where you can save more and spend wisely.

feature3.title: Personalized Advice
feature3.description: Get tailored financial advice based on your unique situation, goals, and spending habits.

Pricing.title: Pricing
Pricing.heading: Affordable plans for everyone
Pricing.description: Waletoo offers flexible pricing plans to fit your needs and budget. Start your journey to financial freedom today.
